exception.impl: The implementation used cannot create FullTOCControl.
exception.extent: Cannot get the extent of the layer
exception.capabilities: An error has occurred in obtaining the GetCapabilities document
exception.no_http_https: No http or https services allowed
exception.valid_url: You must provide a valid URL
exception.select_layer: You must select at least one layer
exception.no_results: No layers found in this service
exception.codsi: An error occurred while consulting the CODSI catalog
exception.codsi_no_results: There are no results for your search
exception.fulltoc_obsolete: Message to the developer: M.plugin.FullTOC has been deprecated, please use M.plugin.Layerswitcher instead
